 Kali::
"We offer you an non agression pact" said Kali"and help if a faction named infecticons attack... I guess that you have heard about them..."
  warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: Prophetus smiled inside. The discussion was starting to head in the 
way he wanted it to.

Prophetus: I have had wind of this. Tell me more, Kali.

Daemos landed a few meters from there.

Daemos: Yes, tell us more. The only thing we want here is some place 
for us to make an orchard. I assume that is a small price to pay to 
conclude an Alliance...

Jetstorm seemed disappointed not to fight, but he contained himself. 
Maybe the Predacons would accept a challenge to celebrate this 
alliance...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> Kali::
> Kali smiled, she knew that Prophetus  could kill her if he liked... 
but he didn't know that she had a lot little tricks if she needed 
them.
> Kali did her best smiled and said kindly "I guess, lord Prophetus, 
that you know that my brother Shivah wants do an alliance with 
Tripedocus..."
>   warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Prophetus had a grin on 
his face. The towering giant could easily 
> crush his opponent, yet she seemed to defy him openly. She was 
> brave... foolish, but very brave...
> 
> Prophetus: I assume our presence was not unannounced. I am 
Prophetus, 
> and I lead the Tripredacus until Daemos arrives.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > 
> >  Kali:::
> > Kali landed and looked to the tripedocus' force, she smiled and 
said 
> "The Tripedocus, I guess... "
> >   x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote: -- Anachronox --
> > 
> > Anachronox growls, obviously wanting to get into a scrap 
> > today. "Arrr, alright... I won't attack unless you give the 
order." 
> > He arms himself. <Just make one false moves ya slagheap...> He 
> > thinks to himself as he absent mindedly plays with a spear, 
twirling 
> > around his finger.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Prophetus saw the female dragon come out of the volcano.
> > > 
> > > Prophetus: Jetstorm, Anachronox, stay alert. It seems our 
> > neighbour is 
> > > not alone...
> > > 
> > > Jetstorm: Just let 'em make just one wrong move!
> > > 
> > > Prophetus: No! None of that unless they attack... or I give the 
> > order. 
> > > Got that, Anachronox?
> > > 
> > 
> >
